reasons: prediction_0 has more coherent and meaningful lines
output:
In this particular case, as is typically with viruses, but not always, you had to not only
open up the email message, but you then had to click on the little program.
Typically, the program will have its own little icon.
You had to click on that as well.
And so you'd get a message and it would say, please read the attached file, I love love
letter.
You click on the love letter itself and that's when the virus is triggered.
I love love love love love you.
Love you I love you I love love love love love you love you bye
